articles.description: Among the dead was 58-year-old country songwriter Brett James, according to the Nashville Songwriters Hall of Fame.
articles.content: Country singer and songwriter, Brett James, known for the hit Jesus, Take the Wheel," died with two others in a small plane in North Carolinas mountains Tuesday, according to the Nashville Songwriter… [+500 chars]

articles.title: D4vd Cancels U.S. Tour Amid Investigation Into Dead Body in Car Registered to Him - Variety
articles.description: D4vd has canceled his U.S. tour as the investigation intensifies around a dead body found in a car registered to the singer.
articles.content:
Singer D4vd has canceled the remaining dates of his U.S. tour amid an investigation into a dead body found in a car registered to him.
The remaining dates on the singer’s U.S. tour — a concert in Lo… [+2292 chars]
